CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS( RecordType.Name , "Home Automation" ), "Security and Home Automation", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Solar" ), "Solar Energy", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Water" ), "Water and Air Purification", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Remodel" ), "Home Improvement", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Pest Control" ), "Pest Control", RecordType.Name)))))
CustomField.label: Industry-Sales formula
